title: I Am A Priest In The Otherworld - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Supernatural   Xuanhuan
tags: Dense Protagonist   Goddesses   Hidden Abilities   Lack of Common Sense   Male Protagonist   Money Grubber   Naive Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Priests   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation
author: 鸽子馒头
description:
Gallo traveled to the otherworld and by chance became a devout priest.

“When the light shines, be kind and humble with men…”

“It means I have to be obedient during the day…”

“at the moment of the night, confess your sins and forget the disputes.”

“It means I’m going to hit hard at night and persuade people to be good…”>
